00017 #ifndef __MLPACK_CORE_SFINAE_UTILITY
00018 #define __MLPACK_CORE_SFINAE_UTILITY
00019 
00020 #include <boost/utility/enable_if.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/type_traits.hpp>
00022 #include <mlpack/prereqs.hpp>
00023 
00024 /*
00025  * Constructs a template supporting the SFINAE pattern.
00026  *
00027  * This macro generates a template struct that is useful for enabling/disabling
00028  * a method if the template class passed in contains a member function matching
00029  * a given signature with a specified name.
00030  *
00031  * The generated struct should be used in conjunction with boost::disable_if and
00032  * boost::enable_if. Here is an example usage:
00033  *
00034  * For general references, see:
00035  * http://stackoverflow.com/a/264088/391618
00036  *
00037  * For an MLPACK specific use case, see /mlpack/core/util/prefixedoutstream.hpp
00038  * and /mlpack/core/util/prefixedoutstream_impl.hpp
00039  *
00040  * @param NAME the name of the struct to construct. For example: HasToString
00041  * @param FUNC the name of the function to check for. For example: ToString
00042  */
00043 #define HAS_MEM_FUNC(FUNC, NAME)                                               \
00044 template<typename T, typename sig>                                             \
00045 struct NAME {                                                                  \
00046   typedef char yes[1];                                                         \
00047   typedef char no [2];                                                         \
00048   template<typename U, U> struct type_check;                                   \
00049   template<typename _1> static yes &chk(type_check<sig, &_1::FUNC> *);         \
00050   template<typename   > static no  &chk(...);                                  \
00051   static bool const value = sizeof(chk<T>(0)) == sizeof(yes);                  \
00052 };
00053 
00054 #endif
